law.text:
As used in KRS 197.505 to 197.525, unless the context otherwise requires:
"Adult correctional facility" means any minimum or medium adult penal or correctional facility operated for the purpose of housing convicted felons for the department; and
"Private provider" means a private legal entity authorized to do business in the Commonwealth and which is in the business of establishing, operating, and managing adult correctional facilities.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 233, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 93, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1994 Ky.
